entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Tasiujaq
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:17 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Drifting Snow, -33.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Tasiujaq Airport 4:00 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023
Condition: Drifting Snow
Temperature: -33.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.1 kPa rising
Visibility: 19.3 km
Humidity: 65 %
Wind Chill: -51
Dewpoint: -37.6°C
Wind: WSW 34 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Temperature rising to minus 31 by morning.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy near midnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Temperature rising to minus 31 by morning. Wind chill minus 51 this evening and minus 41 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of light snow. High minus 29.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the afternoon then mainly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 29. Wind chill minus 38 in the morning and minus 43 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clearing. Low minus 38.
entry.summary: Clearing in the evening. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h near midnight. Low minus 38. Wind chill minus 43 in the evening and minus 53 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023
